examples: Feed the starving children in India
don't give the child this tough meat
feed carrots into a food processor

definitions.text: take in food; used of animals only
examples: This dog doesn't eat certain kinds of meat

definitions.text: serve as food for; be the food for

examples: the Missouri feeds into the Mississippi

definitions.text: profit from in an exploitatory manner

examples: feed one's eyes on a gorgeous view

definitions.text: provide with fertilizers or add nutrients to
examples: We should fertilize soil if we want to grow healthy plants

definitions.text: give a tip or gratuity to in return for a service, beyond the compensation agreed on
